Body: One of the main purposes of NOIZchain is to change the advertising ecosystem by building up consumer awareness. In the past few years, private data leakage has become a significantly increasing problem. NOIZ wants to establish a transparent ad space, where consumers will have the control. In an effort to achieve this, the engineers at NOIZ have built an AI-enabled, decentralized ad network. Author: JagerBeen
Title: 🚀[ANN] NOIZ Ad Network - Blockchain+AI+Social Impact: An Advertising Trifecta🚀
Body: Guys, checkout some unique features of NOIZchain, they include:  Peer to Peer (P2P) Advertising – NOIZ intends to be a fully P2P marketplace where publishers and advertisers will be able to connect directly with one another and make agreements powered by a smart contract platform.  Peer to Peer Consumer Marketplace – consumers decide which data and with whom they want to share data, and are rewarded with tokens for sharing data with advertisers and publishers.  Coupons and Redemption – NOIZ tokens work like coupons on the advertiser’s website. The advertiser sets up the smart contract and determines the necessary requirements the customer has to meet to redeem tokens.  Consensus-Based for All Parties – Just like a consensus would decide if a certain product or advertisement is beneficial to the community or marketplace; in the same consumers, advertisers, and publishers would decide on activities.

Title: 🚀[ANN] NOIZ Ad Network - Blockchain+AI+Social Impact: An Advertising Trifecta🚀
Body: Tips from the NOIZ Team: How to Avoid ICO Scams  Cryptocurrencies have given rise to a new a type of crowdfunding, or means of raising funds, known as an Initial Coin Offering (ICO), Initial Token Offering (ITO) or a Token Generation Event (TGE). Each of these terms describes the same thing: raising funds by offering the public a share in coins or tokens that exist on a blockchain. Unfortunately, this method of fundraising is very prone to scams.  A simple analogy can be drawn between the well-known initial public offering (IPO) and an ICO. In an IPO, fiat currency is exchanged for shares by investors, whereas in an ICO funds are raised when a quantity of the crowdfunded cryptocurrency is sold to investors in the form of “coins” or “tokens,” in exchange for legal tender or other cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin or ethereum.  These tokens are promoted as future functional units of currency in the project environment if or when the funding goal is met and the project launches. Due to their relative newness, the regulatory environment concerning ICOs and cryptocurrencies is still evolving and the inherent nature of an ICO also renders them susceptible to scams. A majority of projects behind ICOs do not present a functioning product or service before the ICO.  According to research by Ernst & Young, over 10 percent of funds raised by a sample of 370 ICOs were lost or stolen in hacker attacks. Given the ease with which scam ICOs can be set up by fraudsters, investors should be cautious before making an investment. https://medium.com/@NOIZchain/tips-from-the-noiz-team-how-to-avoid-ico-scams-51546a908b57

Title: 🚀[ANN] NOIZ Ad Network - Blockchain+AI+Social Impact: An Advertising Trifecta🚀
Body: Hello, this is a good question.  Bots can be programmed to perform certain tasks across online platforms, such as inputting information into a sign-up form, commenting on a blog post or clicking an affiliate link. If any bots are operating on the NOIZ network, such bots would likely try to pool all the NOIZ tokens in one single exchange/wallet; they would likely never donate/vote for actors in the NOIZ economy; and they likely wouldn't exhibit engagement patterns that match with other humans.  NOIZ can prevent such ad fraud by using Run-Time Execution Monitoring, which recognizes actions of bots and distinguishes them from real users. The NOIZ network will also host investigative bots to continuously monitor the NOIZ token transaction flow on randomly selected wallets, to see patterns related to any bots that may be operating on the network. Finally, NOIZ uses a cognitive bot named NIKOLA to initiate conversation dialogues within each ad, and can classify consumer responses - their engagement - into a level of Intent system and deliver tokens through the NOIZ platform. While you are correct that there are many projects trying to fix the broken digital advertising system by introducing blockchain, NOIZ is the only project that combines BOTH Blockchain AND AI to ensure ending spmabot traffic and high user engagement.  We already have a working prototype of our cognitive ad, which we produced for blue-chip clients in Hong Kong. We are positive that this will result in much greater user engagement.  If you have more questions, don't forget to chat to us on our Telegram channel: t.me/noizchainenglish

Author: NOIZchain
Title: 🚀[ANN] NOIZ Ad Network - Blockchain+AI+Social Impact: An Advertising Trifecta🚀
Body: Hi gametiny,  We will be combining AI and Blockchain systems to make sure spambot traffic cannot skew marketing data in the NOIZ ad exchange. There a couple of ways in which this will be achieved:  Nikola (our cognitive ad) has the ability to discover which user interactions are bot-like, and which resemble humans. The bot-like activities data will be filtered out of the system and never included in reports.  The interaction data will be hashed onto the blockchain and available directly to users, advertisers and publishers. By using blockchain, we ensure that advertisers have access to accurate data about their ads, publishers don't have to worry about data leakage (because we will be using Hyperledger) and users control exactly how much data they are giving out by interacting with the ad.  If you would like some more in-depth explanations, please take a look at our explanatory videos on our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8SOjT2H9jCddqs3F9-VQ4g?
